name: Steel Division 2: Nemesis #5 - Raid on Drvar
summary: Command two unique battlegroups in Nemesis - Raid on Drvar, with the Axis Unternehmen Rösselsprung versus the Allied partisans of the NOV. This Steel Division 2 expansion features a host of new units, from airborne SS-Fs-Jäger to Yugoslav Borci and tank-killing Hurricane Mk IV Vickers.
